parameters.responseBody:
Please send an image of your food along with your health parameters in this format:

height: 175
weight: 70
age: 30
gender: male
ethnicity: caucasian
calories: 2000
sugar: 50

Example: Send a photo of pasta with the text above to get diet compliance analysis.
Image received! Analyzing your food for diet compliance...
Analysis complete! Check your Telegram chat for detailed results.
